author: Ava Peacock
title: MT1 W2021
question: For this function in problem 4 of the 2021 midterm, why don't we need to design a helper function? Isn't it doing a separate task when it compares the image areas since the purpose of the function is only to add areas? Thank You!
student_answer:
I think it's because it's only calling one function on the different datatype.
(also I would argue image-area is a helper function)
